text: @TomiLahren Due to coronavirus absolutely. That doesn't mean all businesses should just #ReOpen when owners have to say they're barely surviving. That doesn't mean #SupportSmallBusiness is something we want to keep saying either. Using compassion & empathy has become sarcasm. #SmallBizRelief
